info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of derivative orders
info.title: Order Derivative Orders APIs

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from securityMaster

maturityDate.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

exoticType.description: The type of exotic derivative instrument

strikePrice.description: The price at which the option holder has the right to buy (Call Options) or sell (Put Options) the underlying instrument, or to cash-settle the option if appropriate

underlyingPrice.description: The underlying price of the transaction

callOrPut.description: Indicates whether the transaction is a call or put. CALL or PUT.

seller.description: The account number through which the currency sold is to be settled.

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from securityMaster

maturityDate.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

exoticType.description: The type of exotic derivative instrument

strikePrice.description: The price at which the option holder has the right to buy (Call Options) or sell (Put Options) the underlying instrument, or to cash-settle the option if appropriate

underlyingPrice.description: The underlying price of the transaction

callOrPut.description: Indicates whether the transaction is a call or put. CALL or PUT.

seller.description: The account number through which the currency sold is to be settled.

autoOrManual.description: Determines whether the systtem will automatically process

transactionChannel.description: The channel through which the transaction has been placed

commissionRate.description: The commission by percentage. Allowed only for manual commission. Calculated commission amount can be overwritten manually.

orderDate.description: The order date of the instructions contained within the transaction

orderedAt.description: The time at which the order has been transacted

maturityDate.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

priceOrPremium.description: The Priceper unit of lot/lots traded. For 'OPTION' trades, this denotes the'PREMIUM' price in TRADE currency

callOrPut.description: Indicates whether the transaction is a call or put. CALL or PUT.

strikePrice.description: The price at which the option holder has the right to buy (Call Options) or sell (Put Options) the underlying instrument, or to cash-settle the option if appropriate

limitType.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

limitPrice.description: The Price at which the shares are to be bought or sold

limitDate.description: The date the Limit order is valid until .

autoOrManual.description: Determines whether the systtem will automatically process

commissionRate.description: The commission by percentage. Allowed only for manual commission. Calculated commission amount can be overwritten manually.

orderToClose.description: Defines whether the trade order is to be Closed or not. When set to CLOSE the order is considered as a square-off order.

closeoutLots.description: The lots to be closed out for the trades provided.

orderStatus.description: The order status which can be OPEN, TRANSMITTED, REJECTED, CANCELLATION REQUEST, CANCELLED, MODIFICATION REQUEST, PARTIAL and FILLED
